name: SII_FDS_Devicenet1
action: [IF]([GT](<*VALUE(Number of DeviceNet Interface Types)*>,0)){<*ASSIGNVALUE(SII Function Design Specification -Devicenet1:<* Eval(16 * 0.9 + (<*VALUE(Number of DeviceNet Interface Types)*> - 1 ) * 4 *0.9) *>)*>}{<*ASSIGNVALUE(SII Function Design Specification -Devicenet1:0)*>}[ENDIF]
description:
SII Function Design Specification -Devicenet1

Calculated Hrs = If dnt > 0 then
  Hrs = 16*0.9 + (dnt-1)*4*0.9
 Else Hrs = 0
